about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Cristian, a passionate Full-Stack Web Developer with a strong foundation in computer science and hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development. I specialize in building modern, dynamic, and responsive applications using React, Next.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js with Express, PostgreSQL, and Prisma. I love turning ideas into clean, efficient solutions that enhance the user experience and improve development workflows. I'm constantly learning and focused on writing scalable, maintainable code.
